apihelp-wikimediaeventsblockededit-summa: Log information about blocked edit attempts
apihelp-wikimediaeventsblockededit-param: A page on which an edit attempt was made
The interface which was used to edit
The platform which was used to edit
tag-cross-wiki-upload-description: Files uploaded from inside the wikitext and visual editors on other wikis
wikimediaevents-special-wikimediadebug-n: This special page is not enabled.
wikimediaevents-special-wikimediadebug-h: The [https://wikitech.wikimedia.org/wiki/WikimediaDebug WikimediaDebug] cookie is currently '''enabled''' on $1. It expires at $2. Click on the button to clear it from this device. Note that this will only clear the cookie on this domain - if you activated it on other domains, you have to separately clear it via the special page on those domains (or use your browser's cookie clearing functionality).

Click on the button to activate the [https://wikitech.wikimedia.org/wiki/WikimediaDebug WikimediaDebug] cookie on $1. When activated, web requests from your device for this wiki will '''send debug logs containing personal information''' to developers. Please only activate this if you have been asked by a developer. Note that this will result in a slower browsing experience. If you are testing cross-domain functionality, remember to also activate the cookie via the special page on the other domain(s) as well.
